resources.string: Missing an emoji? Press the Add/Delete Emojis button at the top!
Here is how it looks on iOS:
Step 1: Go to the Unicode website (it may take a while to load the list)
Step 2: Find the emoji that is to be added, long press on the image under "Apple", and save the image
Step 3: Select and copy the value under "Code" in the same row as the emoji (ex: U+1F600)
Step 4: Paste the copied text into the box below
Step 5: Select the image that was just downloaded (it should be under "Downloads")
